mapper.select: select t.*,ifnull(s.comment_sum, 0) as comment_sum from ( select a.music_id, a.music_name, a.music_url, a.music_lyric_url, a.singer, a.singer_img_url, a.is_chosen, ifnull(b.like_sum, 0) as like_sum from wechat_music as a left join( select music_id,count(music_id) as like_sum from wechat_user_like_music group by music_id) as b on a.music_id = b.music_id) as t left join (select music_id,count(music_id) as comment_sum from wechat_user_comment_music group by music_id) as s on t.music_id = s.music_id order by like_sum desc
select * from wechat_user_like_music where user_open_id = #{openId} order by create_date desc
